Title: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
Body (HTML): This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

Title: Vorse Raider
Body (HTML): This wicked Beast-Warrior does every horrid thing imaginable, and loves it! His axe bears the marks of his countless victims.

Title: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp
Body (HTML): A genie of the lamp that is at the beck and call of its master.
Image Alt Text: La Jinn the Mystical Genie of the Lamp Yu-Gi-Oh! Card

Title: Battle Ox
Body (HTML): A monster with tremendous power, it destroys enemies with a swing of its axe.

Title: Ryu-Kishin Powered
Body (HTML): A gargoyle enhanced by the powers of darkness. Very sharp talons make it a worthy opponent.

Title: Saggi the Dark Clown
Body (HTML): This clown appears from nowhere and executes very strange moves to avoid enemy attacks.
Image Alt Text: Saggi the Dark Clown Yu-Gi-Oh! Card

Title: Kaiser Sea Horse
Body (HTML): This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a LIGHT monster.

Title: Lord of D.
Body (HTML): Neither player can target Dragon monsters on the field with card effects.

Title: X-Head Cannon
Body (HTML): A monster with a mighty cannon barrel, it is able to integrate its attacks. It attacks in many ways by combining and separating with other monsters.

Title: Y-Dragon Head
Body (HTML): Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 "X-Head Cannon" you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. A monster equipped with this card gains 400 ATK/DEF, also if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.

Title: Z-Metal Tank
Body (HTML): Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 "X-Head Cannon" or "Y-Dragon Head" you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. A monster equipped with this card gains 600 ATK/DEF, also if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.

Title: Cyber Jar
Body (HTML): FLIP: Destroy all monsters on the field, then both players reveal the top 5 cards from their Decks, then Special Summon all revealed Level 4 or lower monsters in face-up Attack Position or face-down Defense Position, also add any remaining cards to their hand. (If either player has less than 5 cards in their Deck, reveal as many as possible.)

Title: Spear Dragon
Body (HTML): During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step.

Title: Twin-Headed Behemoth
Body (HTML): During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was destroyed on the field and sent there this turn: You can Special Summon this card, but its ATK/DEF become 1000. You can only use this effect of "Twin-Headed Behemoth" once per Duel.

Title: The Flute of Summoning Dragon
Body (HTML): Special Summon up to 2 Dragon monsters from your hand. "Lord of D." must be on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.
Image Alt Text: The Flute of Summoning Dragon Yu-Gi-Oh! Card

Title: Polymerization
Body (HTML): Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material.

Title: Enemy Controller
Body (HTML):
Activate 1 of these effects.
● Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change that target's battle position.
● Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target until the End Phase.

Title: Shrink
Body (HTML): Target 1 face-up monster on the field
Vendor: its original ATK becomes halved until the end of this turn.

Title: Silent Doom
Body (HTML): Target 1 Normal Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in face-up Defense Position, but it cannot attack.

Title: Cost Down
Body (HTML): Discard 1 card; for the rest of this turn, reduce the Levels of all monsters in your hand by 2 (even after they are Summoned).

Title: Pot of Greed
Body (HTML): Draw 2 cards.

Title: Monster Reborn
Body (HTML): Target 1 monster in either GY

Title: Mystical Space Typhoon
Body (HTML): Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field

Title: De-Fusion
Body (HTML): Target 1 Fusion Monster on the field; return that target to the Extra Deck, then, if all the Fusion Materials that were used for its Fusion Summon are in your GY, you can Special Summon all of them.

Title: Soul Exchange
Body (HTML): Target 1 monster your opponent controls; this turn, if you Tribute a monster, you must Tribute that target, as if you controlled it. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

Title: Card of Demise
Body (HTML): Draw until you have 3 cards in your hand, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, your opponent takes no damage. During the End Phase of this turn, send your entire hand to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Card of Demise" per turn. You cannot Special Summon during the turn you activate this card.

Title: Ring of Defense
Body (HTML): When a Trap effect that inflicts damage is activated: Make that effect damage 0.

Title: Fiend's Sanctuary
Body (HTML): Special Summon 1 "Metal Fiend Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). It cannot attack. Your opponent takes any battle damage you would have taken from battles involving it. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 1000 LP or destroy this Token.

Title: Crush Card Virus
Body (HTML): Tribute 1 DARK monster with 1000 or less ATK; your opponent takes no damage until the end of the next turn after this card resolves, also, you look at your opponent's hand and all monsters they control, and if you do, destroy the monsters among them with 1500 or more ATK, then your opponent can destroy up to 3 monsters with 1500 or more ATK in their Deck.

Title: Ring of Destruction
Body (HTML): During your opponent's turn: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls whose ATK is less than or equal to their LP; destroy that face-up monster, and if you do, take damage equal to its original ATK, then inflict damage to your opponent, equal to the damage you took. You can only activate 1 "Ring of Destruction" per turn.

Title: Negate Attack
Body (HTML): When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.

Title: Interdimensional Matter Transporter
Body (HTML): Target 1 face-up monster you control
Vendor: banish that target until the End Phase.

Title: Cloning
Body (HTML): When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons a monster that has a Level: Target that face-up monster; Special Summon 1 "Clone Token", with the same original Type, Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as that target. When that target is destroyed and sent to the GY, destroy this Token.

Title: Mirror Force
Body (HTML): When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

Title: Magic Cylinder
Body (HTML): When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

Title: Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon
Body (HTML): "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"

Title: XYZ-Dragon Cannon
Body (HTML):
"X-Head Cannon" + "Y-Dragon Head" + "Z-Metal Tank"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. You can discard 1 card, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

Title: Paladin of White Dragon
Body (HTML): You can Ritual Summon this card with "White Dragon Ritual". At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that face-down monster. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" from your hand or Deck, but "Blue-Eyes White Dragons" cannot attack for the rest of this turn.
Image Alt Text: Paladin of White Dragon Yu-Gi-Oh! Card

Title: Dragon Master Knight
Body (HTML):
"Black Luster Soldier" + "Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon"
Must be Fusion Summoned. This card gains 500 ATK for each Dragon monster you control, except this card.
